3.title: High-Tech Master Suite
3.plot: The crew tackles the master suite in a neglected cabin, creating a contemporary mountain retreat designed to take in the views; the shower has a multi-head rain fixture that changes colors depending on the mood.

7.title: Fire, Stone and Views
7.plot: The crew creates a modern spa; a fire feature separates the bathroom and bedroom; two vanities mirror each other on opposite sides of the space; a floor-to-ceiling window sits between two shower stations overlooking the homeowners' wooded backyard.

8.title: Pool Party Bathroom
8.plot:

9.title: Musical Bathroom
9.plot: The crew transforms a moldy, carpeted bathroom into a spa-like space with a soaker tub and a two-person shower; an acoustical wall panel creates the perfect environment for a homeowner who likes to sink; speakers enhance the musical experience.

10.title: Copper Toned
10.plot: A small, moldy bathroom is turned into a large, warm space that features spa-like amenities, including a large hammered copper slipper bathtub, a two-sided fireplace and a shower with a pebbled floor; pennies are turned into tiles for an accent wall.

13.title: Chrome, Color and Cool
13.plot: A small, pink-tiled bathroom is demolished to pave the way for an elegant and edgy master suite with a nod to the 1970s and Airstream trailers.

1.title: Mirror, Mirror
1.plot: Matt Muenster creates a relaxing private oasis, high above the treetops with steam showers, softly glowing sinks, and separate vanities.

2.title: Bachelor Bar Bath
2.plot: A bachelor gets his run-of-the-mill master bath transformed into the ultimate guy's paradise with a built-in bar.

3.title: Clean Lines and Concrete
3.plot: A 1980's master bath is completely transformed into a modern, usable space with custom accents throughout.

4.title: Arts and Crafts Bathroom
4.plot: A moldy, tiny bathroom, covered in ducks is transformed into an Arts and Crafts oasis.

5.title: From Pink to Perfect
5.plot: This family was saddled with not one, but two incredibly Pepto-Dismal looking bathrooms. Matt combines the two spaces to create a dream bath, complete with a water feature.

6.title: Teak Tub Retreat
6.plot: A Seattle couple's 80's master bathroom is transformed into an adult retreat complete with luxurious tub and music-filled shower.

7.title: Hi-Tech Seattle Bath
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Bigger and Brighter
8.plot: This dull, cramped 80's bathroom is transformed into a very hip, edgy space with metal and marble touches and a large tub, fit for two.

9.title: Terrible Terrarium
9.plot: This small, oddly shaped bathroom filled with weird plants is gutted, expanded and fitted with a hidden door.

10.title: Infinity Tub Oasis
10.plot: This gray, dreary San Francisco bath is transformed to a warm, luxurious space with walnut, marble and an infinity tub that overlooks the Golden Gate Bridge.

11.title: Wardrobe Showstopper
11.plot: This 80s bathroom was a carpeted mistake. Poor layout and general ugliness are banished with a series of smart wardrobes for storage, a huge walk-in shower and a fireplace to warm the space up.

12.title: Bath Crashers Goes Blog Cabin
12.plot: Century old home becomes someone's dream house on beautiful Chesapeake Bay. Matt Muenster and the Bath Crashers team transform an entire bedroom/bathroom suite, turning it into a relaxing retreat perfectly suited to the home.

13.title: Elegant Escape
13.plot: A giant bathroom, full of strange levels and bad ideas becomes an elegant retreat, with high-style touches that make the homeowners feel like royalty.

1.title: Fiery Red & Black Bath
1.plot: A standard bathroom gets a sexy, modern makeover with the addition of a black crocodile slab shower and a red countertop.

2.title: Glam Spa Bath
2.plot: A tiny bath is doubled in size and receives a glamorous and elegant makeover that hearkens back to the 1940s.

3.title: Something Old, Something New
3.plot: A small and outdated bathroom gets a spacious makeover that takes advantage of a brick chimney that is original to the home.

4.title: Basement Bathroom Overhaul
4.plot: A dark basement bathroom becomes a private getaway with the addition of a relaxing new tub and plenty of lighting.

5.title: From Brown to Green
5.plot: A big brown bathroom becomes a bright hideaway with a ceiling treatment featuring a lattice arbor that stretches the length of the room.

6.title: Everything AND the Kitchen Sink
6.plot: A claustrophobic bathroom with zero personality is transformed into an open and airy oasis with a Cape Cod feel.

7.title: Sauna and Shower-in-the-Round
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Stainless Steel Floors
8.plot: A forgettable bathroom gets a glam make-over with sparkly, red-crystal walls, a steam shower and a one of a kind floor made of stainless steel.

9.title: Walk-thru Shower
9.plot: A long, skinny and "blah" bathroom turns into a destination full of surprises. A tile path leads through the curvy, walk-thru shower, up the steps to a huge party tub. There's a water feature, a lounge area, and a secret window.

10.title: Seattle Espresso Suite
10.plot: This tiny bathroom is blown up to create a warm, inviting master suite with a whirlpool tub, custom lighting and an espresso bar made from reclaimed fishtail oak.

11.title: Bathroom for Three
11.plot: Matt Muenster takes two small bathrooms, combines them to make one large space to serve a couple and their college-age son. The result is room for all, without skimping on privacy and luxury.

12.title: From Swinging to Serene
12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: Vegas Vodka Bar Bath
13.plot: This bath is pumped up to be worthy of its Las Vegas home with a sexy see-through tub, waterproof TV and custom vodka bar that lights up.

1.title: Wash and Dry
1.plot: Washing and drying take on new meaning in this combined bath/laundry space.

2.title: Reclaimed Craftsman Bath
2.plot: Two bathrooms and a mudroom are transformed into one massive dream space.

3.title: Shower with the Works
3.plot: Brendan and Brittany get a massive two-person shower with a view.

4.title: Treetop Tub
4.plot: Taking advantage of outdoor/indoor space is what this bathroom is all about

6.title: Sky-high Ceiling
6.plot: A large bathroom with a sky high ceiling gets modern makeover.

7.title: Infinity Tub
7.plot: A bathroom is transformed with a lit floor, glass shower and infinity tub.

8.title: Grotto Shower
8.plot: With recycled granite, lighting and wall removal, a tiny bath becomes luxe.

9.title: Sleek and Concrete
9.plot: A bathroom mostly used by girls gets a big boost in storage.

10.title: Bath Goes to Blog
10.plot: Matt turns Blog Cabins master suite into a sweet beach retreat with custom touches and local finds.

11.title: Would You Like a Massage with That?
11.plot: The current bathroom for these homeowners is small and needs to get bigger, fast. They use this space not only for everyday use, but also as a changing area for their pool.

12.title: Dog's Best Bathroom
12.plot: A small outdated bathroom gets a dog-friendly remodel shared by the homeowners and their canines.

13.title: Functional, Funky Formula
13.plot: Two small bathrooms become one big space, spiced up with eye-catching amenities.

imdb.title: Bath Crashers
plot: Licensed contractor Matt Muenster surprises shoppers at a local DIY store with a bathroom renovation.::Megan Covington
